author: lwang046
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is a fix to the Hcal DQM issue in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/29076 which was revealed by https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/29035 after change Hcal frame size from 8 to 10. The previous code was hardcoded for 8 TS case in run2. The change adjust the sample size automatically.
title: HCAL: TDC simulation fix
